sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with gui ji 鬼擊 , demon assault. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 20: 倉公散，主猝鬼 打，鬼排，鬼刺，心腹痛，吐下血便，死不知人 , “Cang gong’s powder controls sudden demon hit , demon push, demon stabbing, with cardiac and abdominal pain, vomiting and defecation with blood, death[-like unconsciousness] and inability to recognize people”. Gui e qi 鬼惡氣 , malign demon qi [1]

Etiological Agent. identical with gui xie 鬼邪 , demon evil. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ai 艾 quoting Yao xing lun 藥性論 : 除鬼氣 , “It removes demon qi”. writes: 治一切鬼惡氣 , “It cures all types of malign demon qi ”.
